type DataProtectionPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制存取加密資料和記憶體的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access encrypted data and memory.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此權限用來控制加密資料，並使用記憶體的能力和類別。This permission is used to control the ability to encrypt data and memory using the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會建立`None`（完全受限制） 或`Unrestricted`存取資料和記憶體。Creates either `None` (fully restricted) or `Unrestricted` access to data and memory. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/CPP/dataprotect.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/CS/dataprotect.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/VB/dataprotect.vb#5)]

Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission
abstract member Intersect : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission override this.Intersect : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同類型。

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會說明兩者所共同描述的作業集合的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個個別的使用權限的需求將會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both individual permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission to test for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的使用權限是指定的權限的子集，如果目前的使用權限會指定一組完全包含的作業中指定的權限。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained in the specified permission. 例如，權限存取是權限的子集存取。For example, a permission for access is a subset of a permission for access. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是權限，表示所有作業，表示由目前使用權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何通過其中之一權限的需求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
